channel.title: [24/7]FancyCraft [Survival][Factions][iConomy][PVP]
channel.description:
FancyCraft
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/521/20120409222154.png/][IMG]http://img521.imageshack.us/img521/6416/20120409222154.png[/img][/URL]
Server IP: play.fancycraft.net
Main Rules:
1. No hacking/mods 2. No swearing or spamming 3. Be respectful to everyone 4. No asking for items or op
Server Description:
We are a faction, pvp, survival based server. We are probably the fanciest of most server and we are well dedicated towards it. We are brand new with a great server. We won't lag much but if we do we always optimize it so it won't lag!
Server Specs:
~4GB RAM ~SSD ~100Mpbs connection
Features:
~Factions ~iConomy ~Donation Plugin (Buycraft) ~ChestShops
Ranks:
~Member (Starters) ~Bronze (Donate $5) ~Silver (Donate $10) ~Gold (Donate $15) ~Platinum (Donate $20)
Owner: Itsyuka (In-game)
Plugins: TimTheEnchanter, Minequery, WorldEdit, NoCheatPlus, Buycraft, Vault, PermissionsEx, WorldGuard, TreasureHunt, iConomy, BKCommonLib, Herochat, mcMMO, NoLaggChunks, Essentials, Factions, Citizens, ShowCaseStandalone, NoLaggItemBuffer, EssentialsSpawn, VanishNoPacket, NoLaggItemStacker, NoLaggMonitor, NoLaggExamine, NoLagg
